column5: Just found this board and want to say hi to all.  Wanted to go fishing today got too late.  I don't have a boat and have limited gear so I was wondering if there are any good spots within a couple hours drive of the gta?  I like to take my dogs and I only take what I eat mainly pickerel and bass.  I usually try for salmon in the season as my wife eats it.  I am a rookie but learning so any help would be great as I have rediscovered my boyhood love, grins. Thanks all...

Welcome to OFC... I am sure you will find what you are looking for and so much more.  Great group of people here full of and amazing amount of information.  Not to mention the humor and compassion.  Cheers Jen
Welcome aboard and welcome to you too, Fatherof3.
welcome to the board, the toronto islands are a good spot that is in toronto if you look back into threads within the last few weeks youll see the nice pike that have been caught there

Hey beastmaster and everybody I just joined as well.  Novice fisherman, but I really enjoy it.  Loving the Pembroke area for the amount of good spots around here.   Hoping to get out to Algonquin for some bass as soon as the season opens
well welcome to the two of ya!!!
Welcome beastmaster.   Hey just saw another new member on this thread as well.   Welcome Patch !
Welcome to our OFC family beastmaster, and you too patch. Enjoy !!!

WElcome to the board Beastmaster, you'll find a wealth of info here.  Do a quick search on fishing in the GTA and you'll find plenty of whta you're looking for.  Patch, welcome aboard as well, anything you need to know you'll find here.  Be careful both, this place is addictive  Maureen
Welcome to the best board on the web you two!  Looking forward to your reports!
welcome aboard and looking forward to your reports in the future.
Welcome to the board! Enjoy the stay and I am sure you will find all the info you need.  Easton
Welcome and Welcome to the board.
